home.heroDesc: Thousands of games, instant play, no downloads needed
home.siteIntro: Explore thousands of free online games, from action-packed adventures to brain-teasing puzzles, from classic retro games to the latest trending hits. No downloads, no registration required - click to play instantly! Whether you're on desktop, tablet, or mobile, enjoy seamless gaming anytime, anywhere.
home.featuredSubtitleDetailed: Handpicked by our editors to ensure every game is worth playing
home.mostPlayedSubtitleDetailed: The top choice of millions of players
home.newestSubtitleDetailed: Discover the latest additions to our platform
home.trendingSubtitleDetailed: See what's trending on RunGame right now
home.popularCategoriesSubtitleDetailed: Quickly find your favorite game types
home.popularTagsSubtitleDetailed: Explore games by popular tags to find the perfect match
home.aboutIntro: RunGame is a leading global free online gaming platform, offering thousands of high-quality games carefully selected from around the world. We believe gaming should be barrier-free - no downloads, no registration, no fees - just pure, instant fun. Whether you're looking for a quick break during work, killing time during your commute, or winding down in the evening, RunGame is your best entertainment companion.
home.whyChooseNoDownloadDesc: All games run directly in your browser, no installation or storage space needed. Click to play instantly.
home.whyChooseFreeDesc: All games are free to play with no hidden charges or subscriptions. Equal access for everyone.
home.whyChooseMultiPlatformDesc: Fully compatible with PC, tablet, and mobile devices. Enjoy gaming anytime, anywhere.
home.whyChooseMultiLanguageDesc: Supports English, Chinese, Spanish, French, and more. No language barriers.
home.whyChooseRegularUpdatesDesc: New games added weekly, keeping the experience fresh. There's always something new to discover.
home.whyChooseSafeReliableDesc: All games are carefully reviewed to ensure content is family-friendly and safe. Play with peace of mind.
home.howToStartDesc: Using RunGame is incredibly easy: browse our game library, click on any game that interests you, and start playing immediately. No complex registration processes, no waiting for downloads, no worrying about device compatibility. We handle the technical stuff - you focus on the fun. You can browse by category (like action, puzzle, sports), filter by tags (like multiplayer, 3D, casual), or search directly for games you're interested in. Every game page includes detailed descriptions and instructions to help you get started quickly.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about RunGame
about.metaTitle: About Us - RunGame Free Online Games
about.metaDescription: Learn about RunGame, your premier destination for free online games. Discover our mission, values, and commitment to providing quality gaming experiences.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: RunGame is your premier destination for free online games. We are passionate gamers who believe that everyone deserves access to quality entertainment without barriers. Founded with the mission to make gaming accessible to all, we've built a platform where you can instantly play thousands of games without downloads, registrations, or paywalls.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is simple: to bring joy and entertainment to people around the world through accessible, high-quality gaming experiences. We carefully curate our game collection to ensure every title meets our standards for fun, engagement, and quality.

instantPlay.label: Instant Play
instantPlay.text: No downloads, no installations - just click and play

free.label: Free Forever
free.text: All our games are completely free to play

diverse.label: Diverse Collection
diverse.text: From puzzles to action games, we have something for everyone

mobile.label: Mobile Friendly
mobile.text: Play on any device, anywhere, anytime

updates.label: Regular Updates
updates.text: New games added weekly to keep the experience fresh

safe.label: Family Safe
safe.text: All content is carefully reviewed for appropriate audiences

accessibility.label: Accessibility
accessibility.text: Gaming should be available to everyone, regardless of their device or location.

quality.label: Quality
quality.text: We believe in quality over quantity, carefully selecting each game in our catalog.

community.label: Community
community.text: Our players are at the heart of everything we do.

innovation.label: Innovation
innovation.text: We continuously improve our platform to provide the best gaming experience.

safety.label: Safety
safety.text: We prioritize user safety and privacy in all our operations.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose RunGame?
whyChoose.content: Unlike other gaming platforms, RunGame focuses on simplicity and accessibility. We don't believe in complicated sign-up processes or intrusive ads. Our platform is designed to get you playing as quickly as possible. Whether you're looking for a quick break during work, entertaining kids at home, or spending a relaxing evening, RunGame has the perfect game for you.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.content: Join millions of players worldwide who trust RunGame for their daily gaming fix. Whether you're a casual player or a dedicated gamer, you'll find something to love in our ever-growing collection.
community.thanks: Thank you for choosing RunGame. Let's play!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your privacy
privacy.metaDescription: Read our privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use RunGame.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to RunGame. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our website. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website rungame.online.

automaticInfo.title: Automatically Collected Information
automaticInfo.content: When you visit RunGame, we automatically collect certain information about your device and browsing actions, including IP address, browser type, operating system, pages viewed, and game play statistics.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and enhance user experience.

advertising.title: Google AdSense and Third-Party Advertising
advertising.intro: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements on RunGame. Google AdSense uses cookies and web beacons to serve ads based on your visits to our site and other sites on the Internet.

googleUse.title: Google's Use of Information:
items: Google uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites
You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ads Settings
You can also opt out of third-party vendors' use of cookies by visiting aboutads.info

analytics.title: Google Analytics
analytics.content: We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic and usage patterns. You can opt out of Google Analytics by installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, operate, and maintain our website, improve user experience, analyze site usage, and display relevant advertisements.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our website is intended for general audiences and is not directed at children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

yourRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, correct, delete your information, and object to processing.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@rungame.online

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Rules and guidelines for using RunGame
terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions that govern your use of RunGame and our services.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: Welcome to RunGame. By accessing or using our website at rungame.online, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you do not have permission to access the Service.

license.title: Use License
license.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to access and use RunGame for personal, non-commercial entertainment purposes.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree to use RunGame only for lawful purposes. You agree not to violate any applicable laws or regulations, infringe upon the rights of others, transmit any harmful or malicious code, or attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems.

thirdPartyGames.title: Third-Party Games
thirdPartyGames.content: RunGame hosts games from third-party developers and publishers. These games are subject to their own terms and conditions. We are not responsible for the content, functionality, or availability of third-party games.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by RunGame and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED AS IS AND AS AVAILABLE WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, RUNGAME SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.content: RunGame displays advertisements to support the free availability of games. By using the Service, you agree that we may display advertisements within the Service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@rungame.online

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us
contact.metaDescription: Get in touch with the RunGame team. We're here to help with questions, feedback, or support.

intro.title: We'd Love to Hear From You
intro.content: At RunGame, we value your feedback, questions, and suggestions. Whether you're experiencing technical issues, have ideas for new games, or simply want to say hello, we're here to help.

gameSubmissions.title: Game Submissions
gameSubmissions.content: Are you a game developer interested in having your games featured on RunGame? Email us at games@rungame.online

partnerships.title: Partnership Opportunities
partnerships.content: Interested in advertising, sponsorships, or business collaborations? Email us at partnerships@rungame.online

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.content: We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours during business days.

feedback.title: Feedback & Suggestions
feedback.content: Your input helps us improve RunGame! Share your thoughts at feedback@rungame.online.

sidebar.aboutInfo: RunGame offers thousands of free online games, no downloads required, play instantly in your browser!

play-categorydata-gamecount-free-categor: Play {0}+ free {1} games on RunGame. Enjoy browser-based gaming with no downloads required.
